### TeamMatchTbl.csv
```{r cars}
team_match <- read.csv("data/MatchStatsTbl.csv")
row_count <- nrow(team_match)
col_count <- ncol(team_match)
cat("There are", row_count, "rows.\n")
cat("There are", col_count, "columns.\n")
names <- colnames(team_match)
print(names)

# Sort based on win or lose
# df.sort_values(
# Makes sure all numbers are proper
for (i in 1:row_count) {
  total <- team_match$Win[i]
  print(total)
}
```
